description: We're firing up the grill early to start our first tailgating weekend! Our butchers make special footlong sausages for our team to grill up, and we'll have special sides from the deli, all just $5 a plate.
name: Tailgating $5 Footlong Sausages

description:
Nights at the Museum, UMMA’s first-ever exterior media art initiative, is open to the public, and will run from September 2-9 from 8:30 p.m. to dawn along its State Street-side facade.

Nights at the Museum begins Friday, Sept. 2, during Artscapade!, a Welcome Week event for new U-M students, and concludes on Friday, Sept. 9 at UMMA’s twice-annual After Hours community celebration.

On Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, from dusk to dawn, UMMA will showcase a digital art installation by Quayola called Pleasant Places. Inspired by the work of Vincent Van Gogh, Quayola has returned to the same countryside of Provence 125 years later to create of a series of digital paintings exploring the boundary between representation and abstraction. Pleasant Places will also be projected overnight throughout the remainder of the week. 

For the Full Schedule Check Here: http://www.umma.umich.edu/news/2016/umma-to-light-up-campus-with-nights-at-the-museum
name: Nights at the Museum

description:
We're having a huge UV Paint Party to kick off the season! We'll have paint cannons splashing you with water-based, kid-safe, and washable paint + black lights all over to make the colors stand out. Wear white to really make it pop! 

Don't want to? No problem. Watch from the mezzanine and party in the other paint-free places.

• DRINK SPECIALS. Happy Hour is from 9pm - 11pm with
50% off all drinks, shots & bottled beers. $2 Miller Lite bottles & $2 Vodka Drinks all night.

• MUSIC. DJ Hardy spins the best Top 40, Dance & House with host MC Yoda.

• FREE PICTURES with your friends by a professional photographer.

• COVER. $5 for 21+ & $10 for 18 to 20.

Come play in the paint.
name: Ultraviolet: Paint Party at Necto

description:
Max Ellington 
Sanford
Jeff Garcia
Pat in the hat
name: Status quo

description: Our in-house Oktoberfest release is one of our favorite days of the year! Come say "o'zapft is" with us -- we'll have German food specials running all weekend and 11x17 prints of our Oktoberfest poster wil be available for purchase. Prost!
name: Oktoberfest Release

description: Ann Arbor Poetry Slam is back this Sunday with another all ages open community free-speech event! To read or perform, sign up between 6:30 & 7:00. The show starts at 7. There is a five dollar suggested donation at the door. All proceeds go to send winning poets to National and International poetry tournaments. DIY. Grass-roots. Since 1987. Come early. Stay late. Bring the world. Bring your words. Your host this week is Luis Anderson!
name: Ann Arbor Poetry Slam

description:
The Not-So-Labor-Day is the official all-night-pre-game  to this year's Labor Day! We've all been going hard in the paint, working our asses off, so it's time to cut loose and get a jump on our day off on Monday!!! It's the dance party of the YEAR. 

Featuring:

U X L (Brian Roberts) - A newcomer to the EDM scene with plenty of totally VIRAL beats to kick off the night!

Vest And Tyler - Hnnggngngggwwhhwwnnnggg

KatzMeow - The QUEEN of Bass descends from her throne to grace the peasants and work some hard beats into your souls!

Drop Texture - Making sure you all hit Labor Day RAVING, Drop Texture is ending the night with some deep bass and hitting your chest with some dirty dub!
name: Not-So-Labor Day

description:
Books and brews are a-go! Sweetwaters Westgate (inside the renovated Ann Arbor District Library West Branch) will be open and ready for families, friends, and Sweetwaters fans Tuesday, September 6 at 9am with a GRAND OPENING PARTY Sunday, September 18 at 12noon.

The GRAND OPENING PARTY will include two live concerts, a ribbon cutting, a Chinese Lion Dance, and refreshments!  Check out http://www.aadl.org/node/345699
__________________________

TUESDAY,  SEPT 6
Lucky guest #100 will win FREE coffee or tea for a year!
&
Buy any Triple drink get a free mini pastry, allllll day long (while supplies last)

WEDNESDAY, SEPT  7
FREE cute mini Cold Brew for the first 30 guests starting @ 9am.

THURSDAY, SEPT 8
All day, buy any Triple drink get a free mini cookie! (while supplies last)

FRIDAY, SEPT 9
Precious little mini Cold Brews, FREE for the first 30 guests starting @ noon.

SATURDAY, SEPT 10
All day, buy any Triple drink get a free mini dessert! What could it be?! (while supplies last)

SUNDAY, SEPT 11
BOGO cards (to use at that time or next purchase) especially for the first 50 guests starting at opening & then again for the first 50 guests starting at 4pm!

MONDAY, SEPT 12
Buy any Triple drink get a free mini dessert, until 3pm
&
THEN for the first 40 guests starting at 3pm, FREE mini Cold Brew! The perfect afternoon pick-me-up!
__________________________

Stay tuned for updates! Invite your fellow Sweetwaters enthusiasts <3
name: Sweetwaters Westgate Grand Opening!

description:
Arbor Brewing Company presents...
ACOUSTIC TUESDAYS!
Every Tuesday at 7pm, we’ll be featuring live acoustic sets from the area’s most talented artists.

Andrew Langdon Brown, Guitar player and songwriter from Appleseed Collective was born the son of a Motown session musician. After a brief trip to New Orleans as a teenager he became obsessed with fusing an eclectic blend of pre-World-War II american roots music, bluegrass and jazz with modern and genre bending, and poetic songwriting. 

New a cover
Always a good time
name: Acoustic Tuesdays: Andrew Langdon Brown
